243:1: abhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam|
243:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrutakulavinayamahānakṣudranipuṇamatiraviṣamavyavahāraratiranekaśāstrābhyāsādālakṣitavacanasauṣṭhabaḥ karuṇānuvṛttyā samantato visyandamānadhanasamṛddhirmahāpradānairmahādhanatvād gṛhapatiratnasaṃmato'nyatamasya rājñaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva|
243:6: atha kadācittasminmahāsattve rājakulamabhigate kenacideva karaṇīyena tasya śvaśrūrduhitaramavalokayituṃ tadgṛhamabhijagāma|
243:7: kṛtābhyāgamanasatkārā ca saṃkathāprastāvāgataṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ bodhisattvabhāryāṃ rahasi kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ paryapṛcchatkaccittvāṃ tāta bhartā nāvamanyate|
243:12: atha sā tasyā mātā jaropahataśrutismṛtitvāllajjāsaṃkucitākṣaraṃ tanayayā tadvacanamabhidhīyamānaṃ na samyagupadhārayāmāta|
243:14: sā sasvaramabhiruditā svāṃ duhitaramanuśocantī duḥkhāvegavaśātparidevanaparā babhūva|
243:15: kīdṛśastasya śīlaguṇasamudācāro ya evamanuraktaṃ svaṃ janamapahāya pravrajitaḥ ?
243:18: kṣitipābhimatasya tasya vai vanavāse praṇatā matiḥ katham||2||
243:20: kathamekapade rujaṃ vinā vibhavodgāri gṛhaṃ sa muktavān||3||
243:24: śuciśīladhanaḥ kimāpnuyānna sa geheṣu vane yadīpsati||5||
243:28: na ghṛṇāpathameti mānasaṃ yadi vā dharmalavo'pi sidhyati||7||
243:29: atha sā bodhisattvasya patnī tena mātuḥ karuṇenākṛtakena paridevitena patipravrajyābhisaṃbandhena strīsvabhāvād vyathitahṛdayā sasaṃbhramā viṣādaviklavamukhī śokaduḥkhābhinipātasaṃkṣobhādvismṛtakathāprastāvasaṃbandhā pravrajito me bharteti madvyavasthāpanārthamambā gṛhamidamabhigatā vipriyaśravaṇāditi niścayamupetya saparidevitaṃ sasvaraṃ rudatī mohamupajagāma bālā|
243:31: tacchrutvā prātiveśyamitrasvajanabandhuvargaḥ saṃśritajano brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaśca tasya gṛhapateranurāgavaśānugāḥ prāyaśaśca paurāstadgṛhamabhijagmuḥ|
243:34: atha bodhisattvo rājakulāt svabhavanasamīpamupagataḥ sākrandaśabdaṃ svabhavanamavetya mahataśca janakāyasya saṃnipātaṃ svaṃ puruṣamanvādideśa jñāyatāṃ kimetaditi|
243:38: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtyā śuddhāśayaḥ pratyādiṣṭa iva tena vacasā samupajātavrīḍasaṃvegaścintāmāpede |
243:41: gṛhābhimukha eva syāṃ yadi kiṃ mama pauruṣam||10||
243:42: syāddoṣabhaktiḥ prathitā mayaivaṃ guṇeṣvavajñāvirasā ca vṛttiḥ|
243:43: yāyāmataḥ sādhujane laghutvaṃ ki jīvitaṃ syācca tathāvidhasya||11||
243:46: iti vicintya sa mahātmā tata eva pratinivṛtya rājñaḥ pratihārayāmāsa-śreṣṭhī punardraṣṭumicchati devamiti|
243:51: mayi sthite bandhusuhṛdviśiṣṭe tvaṃ kena duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāsi|
243:52: yannāpahartuṃ prabhutā mama syāddhanena nītyā balasaṃpadā vā||13||
243:57: iti sa mahātmā sasnehabahumānamabhihito rājñā sānunayamenamuvāca-
243:59: ato na duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāmi yamarthamuddiśya tu taṃ nibodha||15||
243:65: na hi bhavadvidhānāṃ janapravādasaṃpādanābhirādhyā guṇavibhūtistadasaṃpādanavirādhyā vā|
243:67: kurvīta yastā hṛdaye'pi tāvatsyātso'pahāsyaḥ kimuta prapattā||17||
243:72: tasyā na hīyeta naraḥ sadharmā hriyāpi tāvaddhuramudvahettām||18||
243:73: saṃbhāvanāyāṃ guṇabhāvanāyāṃ saṃdṛśyamāno hi yathā tathā vā|
243:74: viśeṣato bhāti yaśaḥprasiddhyā syāttvanyathā śuṣka ivodapānaḥ||19||
243:76: vicūrṇitā kīrtitanurnarāṇāṃ duḥkhena śaknoti punaḥ prasartum||20||
243:78: krodhocchiraskāniva kṛṣṇasarpānyukto'si māṃ deva na saṃniṣeddhum||21||
243:79: snehena bhaktijñatayā ca kāmaṃ yukto vidhirbhṛtyajane tavāyam|
243:80: vittena tu pravrajitasya kiṃ me parigrahakleśaparigraheṇa||22||
243:81: ityanunīya sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñastena tata eva vanāya pratasthe|
243:82: athainaṃ suhṛdo jñātayaḥ saṃśritāścābhigamya śokāśrupariplutanayanāḥ pādayoḥ saṃpariṣvajya nivārayitumīṣuḥ|
243:87: gṛhāśrama eva puṇyatama ityevamanye śrutiyuktisaṃgrathitaṃ grāhayitumīhāṃ cakrire|
243:88: tapovanavāsaduḥkhatāsaṃkīrtanaiḥ kāryaśeṣaparisamāptyā yācñayā paralokaphalasaṃdehakathābhistaistaiśca vārttāviśeṣairnivartayitumenaṃ vyāyacchanta|
243:89: tasya tān pravrajyāśrayavimukhān vanagamananivāraṇadhīramukhān nayanajalārdramukhān suhṛdo'bhivīkṣya vyaktamiti cintā babhūva-
243:90: suhṛtpratijñaiḥ suhṛdi pramatte nyāyyaṃ hitaṃ rūkṣamapi prayoktum|
243:91: rūḍhaḥ satāmeṣa hi dharmamārgaḥ prāgeva rūcyaṃ ca hitaṃ ca yatsyāt||23||
243:92: vanād gṛhaṃ śreya idaṃ tvamīṣāṃ svastheṣu citteṣu kathaṃ nu ruḍham|
243:94: mṛto mariṣyannapi vā manuṣyaścyutaśca dharmāditi roditavyam|
243:95: kayā nu buddhyā vanavāsakāmaṃ māmeva jīvantamamī rudanti||25||
243:96: madviprayogastvatha śokaheturmayā samaṃ kiṃ na vane vasanti|
243:97: gehāni cetkāntatarāṇi mattaḥ ko nvādaro bāṣpaparivyayena||26||
243:98: atha tvidānīṃ svajanānurāgaḥ karoti naiṣāṃ tapase'bhyanujñām|
243:102: nivāraṇārthāni sagadgadāni vākyāni sāśrūṇi ca locanāni|
243:103: praṇāmalolāni śirāṃsi caiṣāṃ mānaṃ samānasya yathā karoti||29||
243:108: ye me haranti sma puraḥsaratvaṃ raṇeṣu mattadvipasaṃkaṭeṣu|
243:109: nānuvrajantyadya vanāya te māṃ kiṃsvitsa evāsmi ta eva ceme||32||
243:110: smarāmi naiṣāṃ viguṇaṃ prayātuṃ snehasya yatsaṃkṣayakāraṇaṃ syāt|
243:112: mamaiva vā nirguṃṇabhāva eṣa nānuvrajantyadya vanāya yanmām|
243:113: guṇāvabaddhāni hi mānasāni kasyāsti viśleṣayituṃ prabhutvam||34||
243:114: ye vā prakāśānapi gehadoṣānguṇānna paśyanti tapovane vā|
243:116: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetūnkāmānvihātuṃ na samutsahante|
243:117: tapovanaṃ tadviparītamete tyajanti māṃ cādya dhigastu moham||36||
243:118: yairvipralabdhāḥ suhṛdo mamaite na yānti śāntiṃ nikhilāśca lokāḥ|
243:120: iti sa parigaṇayya niścitātmā praṇayamayāni suhṛdviceṣṭitāni|
243:122: tadevamabhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam|
243:123: yato bhikṣurityupāsaka iti guṇataḥ saṃbhāvyamānena sādhunā tadbhāvasādhubhirguṇairabhyalaṃkartavya evātmā|
